appProjects.name: Racing Game
appProjects.description: Simple casual racing game. Tilt to steer, avoid going off road, finish in the best time possible!

appProjects.name: 3D Game Engine
appProjects.description: A basic 3D game engine built using LibGdx. Source on github.

appProjects.name: Zombie Survival
appProjects.description: Touch the screen to guide your character away from the chasing zombies!

appProjects.name: Quack Attack
appProjects.description: Quack Attack is a fun casual Duck Hunting game!

appProjects.name: 4 Games 1 Screen
appProjects.description: Play four different games, all at the same time... 4 Games 1 Screen is the ultimate brain training challenge!

appProjects.name: Street Race Swipe
appProjects.description: Street Race Swipe is a fun simple casual racing game!

appProjects.name: Fruit Run Slot Machine
appProjects.description: Like slot machines, fruit machines, and one armed bandits? Play this game!

appProjects.name: Super Jump
appProjects.description: Super Jump is a super fun infinite platform jumping game!

appProjects.name: Game Services Tutorial
appProjects.description: Companion app to the google play game services tutorial. Source on github, tutorial on blog.

appProjects.name: Little Fish
appProjects.description: Little Fish is a fun game for all ages - eat the smaller fish and avoid being eaten by the bigger fish!

appProjects.name: Jewel Match
appProjects.description: Jewel Match is a challenging and addictive jewel matching puzzle game!

appProjects.name: Sensory
appProjects.description: Multitouch cause and effect app (for people with special needs and young children). Source on github.

appProjects.name: Sensory Live Wallpaper
appProjects.description: Colourful starburst particle effects on your home screen. Source on github.

appProjects.name: Count 1 to 10
appProjects.description: Learn to count from 1 to 10 in English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and Welsh

appProjects.name: Tappy Run
appProjects.description: Fun infinite running game with blocky voxel graphics and one tap controls!

appProjects.name: Hungry Caterpillar
appProjects.description: Classic snake game updated - play on phone or tablet using one tap controls, or fire tv using a remote or game controller!

appProjects.name: Maths Quiz
appProjects.description: A simple and fun maths quiz game with addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division problems.
